Room.Name: Nab's Sitting Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the sitting room reserved for Nab, the great wizard.
Room.LongDescription: The room is furnished in tasteful pieces of carved cheerywood and rich tapistries in bright colors. A pot of tea and tiny crystal cups stand on the sideboard. There is an alabaster pillar by the door, with a single amethest mounted atop it. When you look closely, you see dark shadows swirl inside the gem.
